statements: SELECT * FROM retirement_transactions;
SELECT account_id, transaction_type, amount FROM retirement_transactions;
SELECT transaction_id, transaction_type FROM retirement_transactions WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT account_id, transaction_date FROM retirement_transactions WHERE transaction_type = 'withdrawal';
SELECT transaction_type, transaction_date FROM retirement_transactions ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT transaction_id, account_id, transaction_type, amount, transaction_date FROM retirement_transactions WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY transaction_date DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT * FROM retirement_transactions WHERE transaction_type = 'deposit' ORDER BY amount ASC
SELECT account_id, SUM(amount) AS total_amount FROM retirement_transactions GROUP BY account_id HAVING total_amount > 5000 ORDER BY total_amount DESC
SELECT transaction_type, COUNT(*) AS transaction_count FROM retirement_transactions GROUP BY transaction_type HAVING transaction_count > 2 ORDER BY transaction_type
SELECT transaction_id, transaction_type, DATE_FORMAT(transaction_date, '%M %d, %Y') AS formatted_date FROM retirement_transactions WHERE transaction_id IN (1001, 1003, 1005)
SELECT * FROM contributions WHERE amount > 1000
SELECT id, amount, transaction_date FROM contributions
SELECT * FROM withdrawals WHERE withdrawal_date='2022-01-15'
SELECT account_id, withdrawal_date FROM withdrawals
SELECT id, amount FROM contributions WHERE amount < 500
SELECT id, account_id, amount, transaction_date FROM contributions WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY transaction_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT account_id, amount, transaction_date FROM contributions WHERE account_id = 100 ORDER BY amount ASC, transaction_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM contributions WHERE transaction_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31' ORDER BY id;
SELECT account_id, SUM(amount) AS total_amount FROM contributions GROUP BY account_id HAVING total_amount > 5000 ORDER BY total_amount DESC;
SELECT id, account_id, withdrawal_date, amount FROM withdrawals WHERE withdrawal_date >= '2021-08-01' ORDER BY withdrawal_date ASC, amount DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT * FROM retirement_contributions
SELECT id, contribution_amount FROM retirement_contributions WHERE user_id = 1
SELECT contribution_date, contribution_amount FROM retirement_contributions ORDER BY contribution_date DESC
SELECT user_id, SUM(contribution_amount) AS total_contributions FROM retirement_contributions GROUP BY user_id
SELECT a.user_id, a.balance_amount, r.contribution_amount FROM account_balances AS a JOIN retirement_contributions AS r ON a.user_id = r.user_id
SELECT * FROM retirement_contributions ORDER BY contribution_date DESC;
SELECT user_id, SUM(contribution_amount) AS total_contributions FROM retirement_contributions GROUP BY user_id;
SELECT user_id, MAX(contribution_amount) AS highest_contribution FROM retirement_contributions;
SELECT * FROM withdrawal_transactions WHERE withdrawal_amount > 1000 ORDER BY withdrawal_date ASC;
SELECT user_id, balance_amount FROM account_balances WHERE balance_amount < 5000;
SELECT id, account_id, amount, contribution_date FROM contributions ORDER BY contribution_date DESC, amount ASC
SELECT * FROM accounts WHERE account_type = 'Savings'
SELECT id, owner_name, account_type FROM accounts WHERE id IN (1, 3, 5)
SELECT id, transaction_date, amount FROM transactions WHERE transaction_type = 'Deposit' ORDER BY transaction_date DESC
SELECT account_id, SUM(amount) AS total_contribution FROM contributions GROUP BY account_id HAVING total_contribution > 1000
SELECT * FROM contributions ORDER BY amount DESC, contribution_date ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT id, account_id, amount, contribution_date FROM contributions WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY contribution_date DESC;
SELECT account_id, SUM(amount) AS total_contribution FROM contributions GROUP BY account_id HAVING total_contribution > 5000 ORDER BY total_contribution DESC;
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE transaction_type = 'deposit' AND amount > 500 ORDER BY transaction_date ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT account_id, COUNT(id) AS total_transactions FROM transactions GROUP BY account_id HAVING total_transactions > 10 ORDER BY total_transactions DESC;
SELECT * FROM contributions;
SELECT account_id, contribution_amount, contribution_date FROM contributions WHERE contribution_amount > 1000;
SELECT * FROM withdrawals ORDER BY withdrawal_date DESC;
SELECT account_id, withdrawal_amount FROM withdrawals WHERE reason='Medical';
SELECT employee_name, hire_date FROM employees WHERE hire_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT * FROM contributions WHERE account_id = 101 ORDER BY contribution_date DESC;
SELECT account_name, balance FROM accounts WHERE balance > 5000;
SELECT account_id, SUM(contribution_amount) AS total_contributions FROM contributions GROUP BY account_id;
SELECT employee_name, hire_date FROM employees ORDER BY hire_date ASC;
SELECT account_id, transaction_type, amount, transaction_date FROM transactions WHERE amount > 100 ORDER BY amount DESC, transaction_date ASC;
